mapper.select: SELECT a.state,a.result,a.create_time,m.model_id,m.field,m.item_label,m.id,m.priority,m.data_type,m.is_child,p.attr_value, m.opt_value,m.unit,a.user_id,u.name,u.avatar,u.mobile,u.dept_name,u.position FROM approval a LEFT JOIN model_item m ON a.model_id = m.model_id LEFT JOIN approval_attr p ON p.attr_name = m.field LEFT JOIN approval_user u ON u.id = a.user_id WHERE a.id = p.approval_id AND a.id = #{approvalId} ORDER BY m.priority ASC

SELECT a.state,a.result,a.create_time,m.model_id,a.user_id,u.name,u.avatar,u.mobile,u.dept_name,u.position FROM approval a LEFT JOIN model_item m ON a.model_id = m.model_id LEFT JOIN approval_user u ON u.id = a.user_id WHERE a.id = #{approvalId} GROUP BY a.id
